attributes.additional_details:
Earlier this year, Britain became the first country in the G7 to honour its commitment to ring fencing 0.7 per cent of gross national income for foreign aid.  In 2013, £11.4bn Taxpayers money was spent on overseas development. Estimated 2014 was £11.8bn .
Only Sweden, Norway, Luxembourg, Denmark and the United Arab Emirates met or exceeded the 0.7 per cent target in 2013. NO GERMANY or FRANCE here. Volume, the UK is the SECOND OVERSEAS aid donor.
Government says that International aid HELPS PREVENT failed states from becoming havens for terrorists, 'REDUCES MIGRANT' pressures and promotes global prosperity.
attributes.background: Reduce foreign aid! As we receive anyone from anywhere in the world, re-channel total cost of supporting those migrant families allowed into UK, for cost of their accommodation, education, health, Utilities, BENEFITS, pensions, Translators etc, from Foreign aid ring fenced (£11.4bn in 2013&14 )

rejection.details:
You have re-started this petition with your full name and it has been published:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107414
